Or.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes/Reinstall
Changes:
Contains all enhancements there were recently released for https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-16-0-8-2-for-virtualbox-point-release/15836
Alternatively:
In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).

item.title: Qubes-Whonix 16 TemplateVMs (4.0.6-202210241524) -- Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 25 May 22

How-to: Install the Stable Version of Qubes-Whonix ™ 16

How to Install Qubes-Whonix ™ 16

Or.

Whonix – 9 Feb 22

Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ Templates: Stable Version

How to Reinstall Qubes-Whonix ™ Templates - Stable Version

Changes:

Contains all enhancements there were recently released for Whonix 16.0.8.2 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!

Alternatively:

In-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.
